alias.description: Aliases for the record. Allows defining extra paths that will behave like a copy of the record. Allows having paths shorthands like `/users/:id` and `/u/:id`. All `alias` and `path` values must share the same params.

end.description: Should the RegExp match until the end by appending a `$` to it.

meta.description: Arbitrary data attached to the record.

path.description: Path of the record. Should start with `/` unless the record is the child of another record.

strict.description: Whether to disallow a trailing slash or not.

RouteMeta.description: Interface to type `meta` fields in route records.
